verses.1: Tua ciangin Job in a thu genkik a,
verses.2: “Ka nuntakna nidang a bang hikik henla, Pasian in kei hong et hun lai bang hong hikik leh ka ut hi.
verses.3: Tua hun lai-in Pasian in kei hong ompih tawntung a, khuamial sungah ka pai laitakin khuavak hong pia hi.
verses.4: Tua hun pen ka cihtheih hun laitak hi a, Pasian in ka innkuan a hong hut laitak hun ahi hi.
verses.5: Tua hun lai-in Vanglian Pasian in kei hong ompih a, ka kimkot ah ka tate a om uh hi.
verses.6: Ka bawngte le ka keelte in nawi deih zahzah hong pia uh a, suang tam penna nangawn ah ka oliv kungte hoih mahmah hi.
verses.7: Khua sung upate a kikhop uh ciangin a kikhawm dingin kei ka pai ciangin
verses.8: kei hong muh phetun khangnote in tutna hong awn uh a, kei hong zahtakna limun papite na ding uh hi.
verses.9: Khua sung uliante a kiho na khawl pah uh a, a khut uh tawh a kam uh na hum uh hi.
verses.10: Mi a thupi pente nangawn na gamdai pah uh a, kuamah pau loin na om uh hi.
verses.11: “Ka thugen a za mi peuhmah in a hoih lamin na za uh a, a hong mu mi peuhmah in dik hong sa uh hi.
verses.12: Mizawng ka theih peuhmah ka huh tawntung a, cih nading thei lo tagahte zong ka huh hi.
verses.13: A lungkham a cimawhte in kei hong phat uh a, meigong numeite a lungnuamin ka omsak hi.
verses.14: Thuman, puan bangin ka silh a, thuman in kei hong tuam hi. Thutang, puan pi-in ka silh a, thutang in kei hong tuam hi.
verses.15: Mittaw mite adingin mittang ka hi a, khebai mite adingin khe ka hi hi.
verses.16: Mizawngte adingin a pa uh ka hi a, lungkhamna a thuak, ka theih loh mite nangawn ka panpih tawntung hi.
verses.17: Migiloteʼ gitlohna khempeuh ka susia gawp mang a, amauʼ suk gawp mi khempeuh ka hon khia hi.
verses.18: “Ka nuntak kum sehnel zahin a tam dingin ka ngaihsun a, lungnuam takin inn ah a si dingin ka kilamen hi.
verses.19: A zung in tui a ngah tawntung singkung tawh ka kibang a, daitui in a hiangte a nomsak singkung tawh ka kibang hi.
verses.20: Mi khempeuh in kei hong phat tawntung uh a, ka tha a hat tawntung hi.
verses.21: Mite in ka thugen ngai-in hong ngak dimdem uh a, kuamah pau het loin limtakin hong ngai uh hi.
verses.22: Thu ka gen khit ciangin a gen thuah ding uh bangmah thei nawn lo uh a, ka thugente khempeuh hoihtakin na sang pah uh hi.
verses.23: Lokhote in khuapi guah deih mahmah in a ngak bangin, ka thugente khempeuh hoihtakin na sang uh hi.
verses.24: Itna tawh ka nuihsat ciangin amaute lungnuam mahmah uh a, ka mai a tai ciangin a maigumna uh a bei hi.
verses.25: Amaute ukin a vai ding uh ka hawmsak a, kumpipa in a galkapte a makaih bangin ka makai a, a lungkham uh ciangin amaute ka hehnem hi.
